incidents.title: DNS change
incidents.content: We are making some changes in our DNS configuration. Some of our subdomains may not be available.

incidents.title: DNS Modification
incidents.content:
We are updating our DNS Configuration, which will make our blog unaccessible for some time. We are rolling out a new update for our blog.

2022-08-24T08:24:25.635Z
Resolved

Our DNS Configuration has been updated. You should see our new blog.

Learn more

incidents.title: Download links are no longer working
incidents.content:
Bitly has blocked several of our links to download our apps.

2022-04-27T16:07:17.928Z
Resolved

We have updated our links to our apps.
